The '''Kama Clan''' are the only known survivors of the tragedy of [[Tsurumi Island]]. They are descended from {{LL|"Kama"|,}} who had left the island before the disaster.

==Clan Traditions==
The clan is said to have a rich oral tradition, which is how they have recorded history for millennia.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Sea of Fog and the Rite of the Trees}}</ref>
